koyon inji: Algorithms da ke ba kwamfutoci damar koyo daga bayanai
hanyoyin sadarwa na jijiyoyi: Tsarin kwamfuta wanda aka yi wahayi zuwa ga tsarin kwakwalwa
zurfafa ilmantarwa: Yana amfani da cibiyoyin jijiyoyi da yawa don ayyuka masu rikitarwa
nlp: Yana ba kwamfutoci damar fahimta da sarrafa harshen ɗan adam
hangen nesa na kwamfuta: Yana ba da damar kwamfutoci don 'gani' da fassara bayanan gani
\u0199arfafa ilmantarwa: Koyo ta hanyar gwaji-da-kuskure tare da lada da azabtarwa
ilmantarwa mai kulawa: Koyo daga bayanan da aka yiwa lakabi tare da nau'ikan shigarwa-fitarwa
ilmantarwa mara kulawa: Nemo alamu a cikin bayanai ba tare da an riga an ayyana takalmi ba
data hakar ma'adinai: Gano alamu a cikin manya da hadaddun saitin bayanai
tsarin gwani: Yana kwatanta ikon yanke shawara na ƙwararren ɗan adam
search algorithm: Da dabara yana bincika sararin matsala don nemo mafita
wakilcin ilimi: Yadda aka tsara bayanai da adana su don tsarin AI
robotics: Ma'anar filin tare da ƙira, gini, da amfani da mutummutumi
chatbot: Shirye-shiryen kwamfuta da ke kwatanta zance da mutum
agi: Hasashen AI tare da hankali na matakin ɗan adam a cikin ayyuka da yawa
kwayoyin halitta algorithm: Dabarar neman wahayi ta hanyar hanyoyin juyin halitta
itace yanke shawara: Samfurin kamar bishiya don rarraba bayanai dangane da fasali
goyan bayan injin vector: Algorithm don nemo layi ko babban jirgin sama wanda ya fi raba bayanai
bayesian network: Samfurin yiwuwa wanda ke wakiltar alaƙa tsakanin masu canji
dabaru masu ban mamaki: Yana mu'amala da tunani wanda yake kusanta maimakon madaidaici
halittar harshe na halitta: Samar da rubutu mai kama da mutum daga bayanan da aka tsara
nazarin tunani: Ƙayyade sautin motsin rai ko niyya bayan guntun rubutu
gane hoto: Gano abubuwa ko fasali a cikin hotuna
gane fuska: Fasahar Biometric wacce ke tantance mutane ta fuskokin fuska
abin hawa mai cin gashin kansa: Motocin da za su iya fahimtar muhallinsu da kewayawa ba tare da shigar mutum ba
fassarar inji: Fassarar rubutu ta atomatik daga wannan harshe zuwa wani
tsarin bada shawara: Yana tsinkaya abubuwan da mai amfani ya yi don ba da shawarar abubuwa ko abun ciki
misali na gaba: Shigar da aka ƙera don yaudarar ƙirar koyon injin
canja wurin ilmantarwa: Sake amfani da ilimi daga aiki ɗaya don inganta koyo akan wani
samfurin halitta: Samfurin AI mai iya ƙirƙirar sabbin bayanai masu kama da tsarin horonsa
alamar AI: AI dangane da sarrafa alamomi da ƙa'idodi (bambanta da cibiyoyin sadarwar jijiyoyi)
Multi-agent tsarin: Tarin wakilan AI suna hulɗa a cikin mahalli mai raba
shirye-shirye masu yiwuwa: Yin amfani da yarukan shirye-shirye don ayyana samfuri masu yiwuwa
neuromorphic kwamfuta: Kayan aikin da aka ƙera don kwaikwayi aikin ƙwayoyin jijiya
